statements: SELECT * FROM lab_test_results;
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_type FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_type, test_result FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_type LIKE 'Blood%';
SELECT patient_id, test_type, test_date FROM lab_test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_type = 'Blood Test';
SELECT test_id, test_result FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT test_type FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT * FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY test_type, test_date DESC;
SELECT test_id, test_type, test_date FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 1002 AND test_result LIKE '%abnormal%' ORDER BY test_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blood_tests;
SELECT test_type, test_result, test_date FROM blood_tests WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT test_type, test_date FROM blood_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT test_type, test_date FROM blood_tests WHERE test_type LIKE 'Blood%';
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_date FROM imaging_tests ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blood_tests WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT test_id, test_type FROM imaging_tests WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND test_type = 'MRI'
SELECT test_id, test_type, test_date FROM blood_tests WHERE patient_id = 2002 ORDER BY test_date ASC
SELECT patient_id, test_date FROM imaging_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM blood_tests INNER JOIN imaging_tests ON blood_tests.patient_id = imaging_tests.patient_id
SELECT * FROM blood_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM blood_tests WHERE patient_id = '123';
SELECT x_ray_type, x_ray_image_url FROM x_ray_results WHERE patient_id = '456' ORDER BY x_ray_type DESC;
SELECT mri_type, mri_report FROM mri_results WHERE patient_id = '789' LIMIT 5;
SELECT test_date, test_name FROM blood_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM blood_tests WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_id, test_name, test_result FROM blood_tests WHERE test_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT patient_id, test_result FROM blood_tests WHERE test_name LIKE 'CBC%';
SELECT * FROM x_ray_results WHERE x_ray_type = 'Head' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM mri_results WHERE mri_type = 'Spine' AND mri_report IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BloodTests;
SELECT test_type, test_result FROM MRITests WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM XRayTests WHERE xray_result LIKE '%abnormal%';
SELECT patient_id, mri_type FROM MRITests WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM BloodTests WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_id, test_type FROM XRayTests ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, mri_result FROM MRITests WHERE mri_type = 'Brain Scan' AND patient_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM XRayTests INNER JOIN MRITests ON XRayTests.patient_id = MRITests.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM MRITests WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, test_date, test_result FROM BloodTests WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM XRayTests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MRITests ON Patients.patient_id = MRITests.patient_id;
